sent.orig: Marine life is incredibly rich and varied.
sent.trans: 海洋生物种类之多、数量之大，简直是不可思议。

sent.orig: In Xi'an in July the sun is incredibly fierce.
Learning C++, good information, enlightened and a look incredibly ah, absolutely worth seeing!
sent.trans: 学习C++的好资料，不看不知道，一看不得了啊，绝对值得一看！

sent.orig: This renewal keeps our bones incredibly strong and uniquely adaptable.
sent.trans: 这种更新使我们的骨骼异常坚硬，适应性奇强。
